tutoexplaincontent-welcome-into-the-refl: Welcome into the Reflection activity. Reflection is a game to learn reflective symmetry
tutobuddycontent-click-here-to-use-your-: Click here to use your Buddy colors for tokens. It will give choice for each token between 4 different colors
tutorainbowcontent-click-here-to-use-col: Click here to use colors of rainbow for tokens. It will give choice for each token between 8 different colors
tutohorizontalcontent-click-here-to-play: Click here to play with horizontal symmetry. The left side of the screen should be identical to the right side of the screen
tutoverticalcontent-click-here-to-play-w: Click here to play with vertical symmetry. The upper side of the screen should be identical to the lower side of the screen
tutobilateralcontent-click-here-to-play-: Click here to play with both- horizontal and vertical symmetry. All 4 parts of the screen should be identical
tutorobotcontent-click-here-to-toggle-ro: Click here to toggle Robot mode. In Robot mode when you click on a token the symmetric token color is changed at the same time. Too easy!
tutocanvascontent-click-on-tokens-to-cha: Click on tokens to change their colors until the image become symmetric
